attributes.action: allow those who commute to work by public transport to the claim the ticket price back from their Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those who take the extra time and trouble to travel to work by public transport do this nation a service. They should be allowed to put the extra money they spend getting to work against the income tax they pay to the government. Getting to work is an income expense.
